fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: At night, visit a player. You will learn their exact role

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: Due to your experience as an ex-00 agent, you cannot be fooled by frames.

fields.name: Scheme:
fields.value:
**Platinum Iris:**
Upon completion, For the rest of the game, as long as at least one SPECTRE agent is alive, all night abilities on non-SPECTRE members that do not require charges can no longer function.
